text: There seemed to be a theme at the 2017 Television Critics Association ( TCA ) summer press tour and it had to do with dusty vehicles and camouflage. Three military dramas will be hitting broadcast networks this fall : “ The Brave ” on NBC, “ Valor ” on the CW and “ SEAL Team ” on CBS. That ’ s not even taking into account the number of military shows already on TV, including long - running procedurals like “ NCIS ” and the post - apocalyptic “ The Last Ship ” on TNT. Other shows, like “ The Night Shift ” and the upcoming “ S. W. A. T. ” aren ’ t directly about the military, but feature characters with service pasts or with direct connections to combat scenarios.
